item.title: CVE-2024-35771|2024-06-21T13:08:45.738Z -- presscustomizr -- customizr
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in presscustomizr Customizr.This issue affects Customizr: from n/a through 4.4.21.
